mapper.sql: id, user_id_1, user_id_2, initiator_id, status, last_message_time, last_message_content, unread_count_1, unread_count_2, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `conversation` (user_id_1, user_id_2, initiator_id, status, last_message_time, last_message_content, unread_count_1, unread_count_2, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId1}, #{userId2}, #{initiatorId}, #{status}, #{lastMessageTime}, #{lastMessageContent}, #{unreadCount1}, #{unreadCount2}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE `conversation` SET last_message_time = #{lastMessageTime}, last_message_content = #{lastMessageContent}, unread_count_1 = #{unreadCount1}, unread_count_2 = #{unreadCount2}, status = #{status}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM `conversation` WHERE user_id_1 = #{userId1} AND user_id_2 = #{userId2} LIMIT 1
